game.name: Train Simulator: BR Class 421 '4CIG' Loco
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Once a very familiar sight across the railways of southern England, the 4CIG electric multiple unit is a classic example of the heritage ‘slam-door’ passenger trains which once formed the backbone of southern passenger services.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Once a very familiar sight across the railways of southern England, the 4CIG electric multiple unit is a classic example of the heritage ‘slam-door’ passenger trains which once formed the backbone of southern passenger services.
